meanings.definition: Not having or using a hand or hands.
meanings.sent1: The unhanded robot could not pick up the ball.
meanings.sent2: She watched in amazement as the unhanded clock ticked away.
meanings.sent3: The unhanded puppet show was both funny and strange.
meanings.sent4: The unhanded branches of the tree reached out like ghostly fingers.
meanings.sent5: The unhanded mannequin in the store window looked eerie and lifelike.

meanings.definition: Not involving the use of hands.
meanings.sent1: The unhanded game could be played using only voice commands.
meanings.sent2: The unhanded puzzle required solving with just the mind.
meanings.sent3: The unhanded cooking competition was chaotic but entertaining.
meanings.sent4: The unhanded dancer moved gracefully, relying solely on footwork.
meanings.sent5: The unhanded challenge tested their creativity and problem-solving skills.

meanings.sent1: His unhanded apology seemed sincere and heartfelt.
meanings.sent2: The unhanded promise was a rare display of honesty.
meanings.sent3: The unhanded magician amazed the audience with pure skill.
meanings.sent4: Her unhanded smile lit up the room with genuine warmth.
meanings.sent5: The unhanded business deal was refreshing in its transparency.
